name: Land of Morphie
description:
Land of Morphie

Land of Morphie is a turn-based multiplayer board game. Two opponents control four characters each, all with different skill sets. The objective of the game is to protect your base while trying to destroy the other player’s base to win the game. Alternatively, players can destroy all their opponent’s characters to win the game.

Check out the full gameplay trailer here: 

Supported Platforms:

PC.

Requires 64-bit processor and operating system

OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10

Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800)/AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2*2300) or equivalent

Memory: 8GB RAM

Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB)/Intel HD 4600/Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB).

Storage: 3GB available space.
